## **Instructions**

1.  Download climate scenario from the CMIP6 project [here](https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/#!/home)

2.  Select the data at monthly resolution

3.  Download both the SSP1 1.9 and SSP5 8.5 scenario It is suggested to perfom one download for the

4.  first scenario and one for the second one

5.  Select near surface air temperature;

6.  Select the EC Earth3(Europe) model

7.  Select the periods 2015 2049 and 2050 2099;

8.  Select all the months

9.  Select the region that you prefer . An area could be from 12 to 30 for longitude and from 34.4 to 72

10. Read the data, extract them

11. Perform all the analysis of Exercitation 2;

12. Calculate the trend for each grid point and plot them

13. Perform all the analysis that you want
